text: Ani apalya gharammadhye sthairyapurvaka raha, ani purvicya ajnanakalapramane apalya srngara (saundarya) ce pradarsana karu naka ani namaja niyimatapane ada karita raha ani jakata (dharmadana) deta raha, ani allaha ani tyacya paigambaracya adesace palana kara. Allaha heca icchito ki he paigambarancya patninno! Tumacyapasuna tyane pratyeka (prakaraci) apavitrata dura karavi, ani tumhala khupa pavitra karave
